properties.name: Bern's Steakhouse
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 1208 S Howard Ave, Tampa, FLTHE world famous Bern\'s Steakhouse. A worthy landmark. The plain exterior disguises an opulent dining experience, impeccable service, and the food is pure luxury. The steaks, naturally, are world class & any cut and style you can imagine are available. Largest wine cellar in the US - no lie. And be sure to request the "kitchen & wine cellar tour" for the behind-the-scenes action. The dessert room upstairs will seal the deal & put you under the table - heaven on a plate. .......... As to be expected, the price is worth it. Reservations recommended. Open 5-10pm.

properties.name: Cork
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 South Tampa\'s newest spot for a glass of wine, tasty food, good conversation and great music. If you\'re looking for somewhere to enjoy a selection of wine and beers from around the world at real world prices... Cork is the place.

properties.name: Daily Eats
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 One of THE best-kept secrets in south Tampa!!!! "Diner" with a twist. Comfort food that even foodies will like! Amazing food, great prices, big menu & they\'re almost always packed because it\'s so good! SWEET POTATO FRIES are HEAVENLY - covered in cinammon & honey. Their "shredder bowls" (basically a sandwich on top of lettuce & brown rice) are amazing. Killer milkshakes too. YUM!

properties.name: Dubliner
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Good laid back Irish pub. Good service & beer selection, outside seating. Open til 3am.

properties.name: Evos
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 awesome "healthy fast food" - no oil cooking: airbaked fries, burgers not grilled in grease (and "humane meat" at that), smoothies, salads, wraps - the crispy thai trout wrap is my personal fave!!! fun ambiance to hang out & eat in, or for take-out. while it is not hard-core-vegan style healthy eating by any stretch, it IS a great option when you need a quick lunch that\'s on the healthy side!

properties.name: Hugo's Spanish Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Small, yummy, unpretentious Spanish food. Good cuban sandwiches (not the best in the world, but good!)

properties.name: Lime
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Central / South American Fusion style menu

properties.name: Macdintons Irish Pub
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Busy (but average) bar. Open til 3am. Certainly not a true Irish pub (more like "irish themed") - go to 4 Green Fields for the real deal ;-)

properties.name: Royal Palace Thai
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Always delicious, lovely fast service. A great spot for weekday lunch - affordable, speedy & tasty lunch-sized portions! Can\'t go wrong. Have eaten here many times over the years. lunch: 11:30-2:30 dinner: 4:30-10:30 (closed monday)
